subject: More El CheapAss Amundo
author: Frank Sumption
full_text:
Trying to point out that a cheap $2 radio works as good as a $400 gold
plated RT-EVP. Of course, I can already hear this fly over the heads of the
ghost hunters out here.

F-S

T ying o poin ou ha a cheap $2 adio wo ks as good as a $400 gold pla ed RT-EVP. O cou se, I can al eady hea his ly o e he heads o he ghos hun e s ou he e.
